snippet: Almost none of the governor’s seasoned staff members are helping Mr. Trump in Ohio, which no candidate since 1964 has lost and still won the White House....
abstract: Almost none of Republican Gov John Kasich's senior political staffers have offered their services to Donald Trump in his battle against Hillary Clinton in Ohio; refusals follow bitter feud between Kasich and Trump that boiled over during nominating convention in Cleveland; strategists say Trump's tough  chances of success in Ohio rest more on his campaign's fundamental structural problems than on lack of Kasich's operatives.
lead_paragraph: Almost none of the governor’s seasoned staff members are helping Mr. Trump in Ohio, which no candidate since 1964 has lost and still won the White House.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Feud With John Kasich May Haunt Him in Ohio
headline.print_headline: In Must-Win Ohio, Trump’s Feud With Kasich Has Come Back to Haunt Him
